EmailTemplate.name: 10-18-21 BNK Connect Webinar Series CBA ROW.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Register! [Webinar] Seamless Banking for a Connected World
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}}, Our connected world is changing the way consumers interact in their day-to-day lives. This includes the way they engage with their bank or credit union, too. Join our CONNECT webinar series for an in-depth discussion on why the shift to a digital-first banking model is critical and what that means for financial institutions. When: Thursday, October 28 at 1 p.m. EDT What to expect: We’re bringing together a panel of experts from NCR, Celent, U.S. Bank, National Bank of Egypt and Royal Bank of Canada. Together they’ll cover: - How innovation is helping transform engagement - New and modern approaches to bridge physical and digital channels - First-hand experiences from Financial Institutions that are on this journey ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Register with code: NCR1028 See you there, The NCR Banking Team <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
